reviews.text: Wish they would finish rebuilding this historic place.
They are closed. The gym I got too is right next door.
Such a nice building it's a waste it's abandoned

Extremely good Thai food at reasonable prices. 

The chrispy duck salad with cashew nuts is a must. The curries and duck are the specialty of the restaurant.
Amazing thai food!

전통있는 유명한 식당이다.
상도 받았던 것으로 기억한다.
음식의 양은 그리 많지 않다.
깔끔하게 음식이 나온다.
아쉽지만 가격은 조금 나간다. ^^
落ち着いて、タイ料理が楽しめます。数十年前から変わらない味が嬉しいですね。
雰囲気は良いですが、味は普通で値段高いです^^;
vegan food, yeah, very delicious. I often meet people here to talk. I look forward to a return visit. This place has a cool feel to it. Ambience reminds me of Colorado Springs area.

A total safe haven for plant-based people. Feels like a commune. No frills vegan Indian restaurant with all-you-can-eat buffet for $8. Tons of veggies, leafy greens and gluten free foods. We dined in due to heavy rain. Can't wait to sit on their front patio and enjoy their baked goods with a beverage.
Great location for quality Vegan food. Got there near seven, it wasn't very crowded. The service was very welcoming and observant.
Good location for vegan food. The service here is above par. The bill was good for how much you get. Menu is similar to a restaurant in El Paso I liked.
My fav location for delicious Vegan food. Went there on a Saturday. The place has a good atmosphere.
Very nice staff and the food was excellent. Didn't take long to arrive and was hot and fresh. Pretty consistent ordering at Pizza Express. There is a takeaway option also if you need to dash.
Very good pizza. Perfect service. I will come back for sure ;).
Such good food! At first it looks like a fast food restaurant but the food is really good quality and tasty!
Good pizza, slow service.
Delicious food. Friendly, helpful staff.

I have been eating here since I was a kid (I'm 35). The deep-fried spring rolls are to die for. The owner and family are wonderful. Don't be fooled by the simple decor - the food is wonderful and from a first-generation Vietnamese Canadian who knows good food with classic techniques. Thanks for 25 years of fantastic dining!!!
The food: Fantastic. The service: Speedy and friendly. The portions: Huge. The price: Great. The wonderful free tea: The finishing touch to a perfect meal. Eat here. Full stop.
Food was great and cheap! They serve some nice tea as well with your meal. The staff was really friendly 😊!
I love his place! The food is always hot and fresh, the service friendly and the prices are more than reasonable. Would highly recommend!

Good service but very dirty restaurant and the most bland and basic pad Thai I've ever eaten, and I've eaten a lot of pad Thai!! I'd suggest eating elsewhere for both a cleaner environment and more flavour. There are lots of good Thai and Vietnamese restaurants in London. Thaifoon and Tamarine on Dundas are both amazing. Thai Cuisine on Gainsborough too.

Love walking into a Starbucks and smelling the fresh coffee. This location was clean and the staff friendly. Coffee was made to order and correctly made for this picky coffee drinker lol. This spot has an area for when you are wanting to socialize or break out the computer/books and do some studying while sipping on a latte. Only problem I seen was the drive through and parking area are very tight but couldn't take a star away just for that. Keep it up at this location cause my little girl and I will definitely be back for our coffee.
Always fast, friendly, and informative! Their coffee is great and their snacks are always yummy! Mobile pickup through their app is always very convenient as well!

Yummy but prices need to stop going up, they  are beyond being a very successful business that has millions of people addicted and stopping for ine of their many yummy beverages and foods almost every day like its crack, stop being greedy with the cost increase of everything, PLEASE. I want to be able to afford my coffee "crack" lol just playing, kinda. Attention there's no illegal drugs served at any Starbucks facility
... that I'm aware of!
Very friendly service. Got the order correct. Fast.
Rude, impersonal staff, slow service, dirty restrooms. The food is blah, you get better quality food at much lower prices at McDonalds or any of the other fast food chains in the area.

We had a late valentines day dinner here and from the moment we stepped in we were impressed.   We didn't wait long to be seated and there was a server within mins to take care of us.  Our food was delicious and filling.  We ended up bringing a portion of our food home to enjoy at home.   The only thing that made it a 4star was the speed of the food once we ordered.  Given the fact it was very busy there were two other couples near us that came after us and were served their food before us.

I’ve loved this place for years. Hadn’t been in a few months, & was shocked at the price increases. 
$22 for a Ceasar salad at lunch? Food, service & atmosphere all great still, but I won’t be going here anymore. They’ve priced themselves out of my range.

The service was excellent - the servers were very attentive. The portions were large and the food was incredible!  Chef John came to our table and made our evening truly special.  We had the pasta special with mushroom soup to start, and the gorgonzola gnocchi with arugula salad to start. This is my favourite restaurant, hands down.

Visited Feb 28,2019  Food is great but went their on a Thursday at around 5:00pm. From the time we ordered and the time it came took 45 minutes.  It was the not the waitress as she made a joke about giving the cooks an evil eye and maybe they would take the hint.  Pasta dosen`t take that long to cook.  I also find the prices have jumped quite a bit. I don't think I will be returning.

Really great food. A wide variety of Italian specialties. Very good attentive service. Expensive though. One draw back: the restrooms are downstairs accessed only by a set of stairs. Well appointed but not overly accessible. Use your cane and take your time.

Food was fantastic. Came for a birthday celebration. Was surprised with a sticky toffee pudding for dessert that was delicious. Restaurant was clean, with a comfortable atmosphere. Will definitely return.

Excellent food ! We went with a wedding party group of 12. We did wait about 1hr for our food. They had a good many people in there.  However, the staff was excellent and kept our drinks filled and fresh warm bread.  This is the second time we've been and have enjoyed it. I got the breaded chicken breast, stuffed with artichoke and provolone, topped with a creamy red pepper sauce. Hubby got the chicken parmesan and our friend got the prime rib with Yorkshire pudding.
Great place for a good dinner. Great place to have a party.

Food is delicious, pricey but quality is there. The interior is nicely designed and has more of a romantic ambience. Parking is very limited so that might become an issue. View is beautiful if you get a window seat with the view of the river.
Good food, do I need to say more?
